item.description:
Hey everyone!

We had such a great time with the last evening social, so we're having another one! Same place, The Rosebud Lounge, which is behind the Rosebud Diner car, on Elm Street. The food and drinks are not expensive, and there is plenty of space. It does not get too crowded, so we can just hang out as long as we want, having fun!

This time I'll get there early and I'll have a big notebook with me to take everyone's orders down, so it's more organized. Cool? Okay then!

Who: EVERYONE is welcome to join us for some ASL chat and relaxation. If you know how to sign, even a little, then you are invited.



This Meetup will run at the Rosebud from 6-9. Anyone who wants to is welcome to go to our afterward to Club Cafe at 9:00PM to see Boston ASL member Mike Flanagan perform!
item.name: Evening ASL Social
